short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Overcome procrastination by blocking distracting sites until tasks are done.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Fuel Your Focus and Foster Connections with Pili Pala 🦋

🚫 Block procrastination sites.
📈 Complete tasks with pomodoro timers.
🔥  Skyrocket your daily multiplier.
💰  Earn coins.
🕐 Unblock time on sites by completing timers.
🛒 Rewards in shop.
👫 Elevate friends and collaborate.
☁️ Help each other achieve dreams.
